API_MODE.description: Whether to enable API mode. This field should always be set to true if you want to specify other settings here.

API_TOKEN.description: The access token for accessing local files and modifying settings.

MANAGED_PREFIX.description: Address prefix used for generating RULE-SET and provider URLs. On Heroku this field should be "https://{App name}.herokuapp.com" (Replace "{App name}" with the one you set above).
